species.name: breloom
descriptions: Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokémon’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
It scatters spores from holes in the cap on its head. It loves warm and humid climates. It feeds on trees and plants in fields and forests.
Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: poison-heal
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

abilities.name: technician
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.
